'''Waveriding Treasure Hunter (III)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. The achievements are earned by following opening [[Chest]]s in the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].
